text: Ryan Timothy Malgarini (born June 12, 1992) is an American actor, and comedian. He is known for his role as Harry Coleman in Freaky Friday. ==Movies== * Freaky Friday (2003) * The United States of Leland (2004) * The Polar Express (2004) * Go Figure (2005) * How to Eat Fried Worms (2006) * The Young Kieslowski (2014), winner of an audience award at the 2014 Los Angeles Film Festival ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Washington (state)
title: Ryan Malgarini
